title: Banana problem session
content: Wts this now ? Wt r we supposed to do ? How important it is ? Do we get any scores from this ?

comments.body: It's pretty chill, just get your laptop and copy whatever is on the board and try to understand. You'll be given a Google forms later to submit your code. Don't worry everything will be told during the session.
OK but y is it named so ?
Like it is easy to peel a banana, so it is called banana problem which means that the assignment is easy to solve

You woke up now uh?
That banana level was over long back
Bruh its over for u not for us...
I can't tell if you're joking ðŸ˜­
No I'm not ðŸ˜‚. Orange problems are medium difficulty because they are harder to peel than bananas and jackfruit problems are the hardest because it is very hard to cut open a jackfruit.
